alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 10:42PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Forest, southeastern Vilas and northern Florence Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1042 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kentuck Lake Campground to 7 miles southeast of Eagle River. Movement was east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Kentuck Lake Campground around 1045 PM CDT. Tipler and Wisconsin Slough Natural Area around 1105 PM CDT. Whisker Lake Wilderness around 1115 PM CDT. Florence around 1120 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Luna-White Deer Campground, Franklin Lake Campground, Anvil Lake Campground, Alvin, Windsor Dam Campground, Conover, Stevens Lake Campground and Nelma. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
